title: Azir Ultimate + Zhonya'd Enemy
body:
I think even though Zhonya makes you un-targetable, I think you should still be "moveable" minus knockup. 

I think Azir Ultimate should actually move someone who Zhonya's, but do no damage. Visually it makes more sense too. So basically non-targeted displacement should still displace excluding knockup.

Examples of Yes/No for Displacements

**Yes (non targeted displacement), but no damage dealt, only displacement**
Azir Emperor's Divide, Yes
Taliyah Weaver's Wall, Yes. 
Orianna Shockwave, Yes.
Trundle Pillar, Yes, but no slow unless they still in slow zone after zhonya ends.

**No's (requires targeting or is knockup)**
Alistar Headbutt, No, targeted
Vayne Condemn, No, targeted
Tristana Buster Shot, No, targeted
Malphite Unstoppable Force, No (is knockup)

replies.body: I would say Orianna's as a no.
Zhonyas was an OP item and if it was still 100 ap it might be worth it. Anyway Ill agree with you because someone who zhonyas against me is the most tiltworthy shit ever.
